description.value: You have a natural talent for magic. This might be due to the presentation of ancient elebrian genes, or maybe you were exposed to a burst of arcane energy that awakened and turbocharged your magical senses. Choose one cantrip from any tradition. You can cast this cantrip as an arcane innate spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell rank equal to half your level rounded up.

publication.title: Starfinder Guilt of the Grave World
